meanings.definition: A specialized cell found in some cyanobacteria that is involved in nitrogen fixation.
meanings.sent1: The heterocyst helps the cyanobacteria to fix nitrogen for growth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the heterocyst to understand how it helps in nitrogen fixation.
meanings.sent3: The heterocyst in the cyanobacteria was so busy fixing nitrogen, it forgot to invite the other cells to the party.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny factory, the heterocyst works tirelessly to convert nitrogen for the cyanobacteria.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the heterocyst appears like a tiny powerhouse, fueling the growth of the cyanobacteria.

meanings.sent1: The heterocyst is a vital part of the cell structure in some cyanobacteria.
meanings.sent2: The biologist observed the heterocyst within the cell under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The cell with the heterocyst was the star of the cyanobacteria community.
meanings.sent4: Within the cell, the heterocyst acts like a mini nitrogen-fixing factory.
meanings.sent5: The heterocyst-containing cell stands out in the cyanobacteria colony, playing a crucial role in nitrogen fixation.
